1: I keep praise continually on my lips.
2: I praise, and the humble hear and rejoice.
3: We praise and honor the divine together.
4: I seek and am heard; I live in peace.
5: Turning to higher truth makes faces shine with radiant confidence.
6: Call out and receive rescue and complete safety.
7: Protective presence surrounds the reverent and brings rescue.
8: Trust the divine and experience goodness and blessing.
9: Revering the divine brings abundant provision and sufficiency.
10: Seeking the divine gives every good thing.
11: Learning deep respect leads to flourishing life.
12: Seek long life to see good.
13: I speak truth with kindness in every word.
14: I do good and pursue peace
15: Integrity draws attentive care and timely help.
16: Doing good brings enduring favor and lasting remembrance on earth.
17: Call; the divine listens and brings complete rescue.
18: Help finds the humble and contrite.
19: Those who do right are rescued from all challenges.
20: Protective care preserves every bone whole and sound.
21: Goodness sustains those who love what is right.
22: Trusting service brings complete restoration and secure belonging.
